## Description {#details}

Matches patterns for <code>vscale</code>.

This can either be a call to <code>llvm.vscale</code> or the constant expression <code>ptrtoint(gep &lt;vscale x 1 x i8&gt;, &lt;vscale x 1 x i8&gt;&#42; null, i32 1&gt;</code> under the right conditions determined by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a>.

Definition at line 2988 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/patternmatch-h">PatternMatch.h</a>.
